tasks.title: Build React task management app
tasks.description: Create a full-stack todo app with React frontend and Node.js backend. Include authentication, drag-and-drop, and data visualization.

tasks.title: Practice LeetCode problems
tasks.description: Complete 5 medium-difficulty problems focusing on dynamic programming and graph algorithms.

tasks.title: Learn Docker containerization
tasks.description: Complete Docker tutorial series and containerize my portfolio website. Document the process for future reference.

tasks.title: Japanese Anki review session
tasks.description: Review 150+ cards focusing on N3 vocabulary and kanji. Add new cards from recent textbook chapter.

tasks.title: Finish character animation tutorial
tasks.description: Complete the walk cycle animation in Blender. Export and add to animation portfolio reel.

tasks.title: Set up Raspberry Pi home server
tasks.description: Install Pi-hole, Jellyfin media server, and file sharing. Configure remote access and backup system.

tasks.title: Morning workout routine
tasks.description: 30-minute bodyweight workout focusing on core and upper body strength. Follow YouTube routine.

tasks.title: Pay rent and utilities
tasks.description: Transfer rent payment and pay electricity, internet, and phone bills. Update budget spreadsheet.

tasks.title: Deep clean apartment
tasks.description: Vacuum, mop floors, clean bathroom, organize desk space. Change Mochi's litter box and wash food bowls.

tasks.title: Apply to 5 software engineer positions
tasks.description: Research companies, customize resume and cover letters, submit applications through various job boards.

tasks.title: Study system design fundamentals
tasks.description: Read chapters 3-5 of 'Designing Data-Intensive Applications'. Take notes on database scaling patterns.

tasks.title: Genki II Chapter 18 exercises
tasks.description: Complete grammar exercises on conditionals and practice writing example sentences. Review with answer key.

tasks.title: Sketch character designs for game project
tasks.description: Create 8-10 character concept sketches for indie game idea. Focus on distinct silhouettes and personalities.

tasks.title: Configure Linux desktop environment
tasks.description: Customize i3wm setup with new color scheme, status bar, and productivity shortcuts. Backup dotfiles to GitHub.

tasks.title: Schedule dentist appointment
tasks.description: Call Dr. Kim's office to schedule 6-month cleaning. Check if insurance covers fluoride treatment.

tasks.title: Update monthly budget spreadsheet
tasks.description: Input November expenses, categorize transactions, check savings goals progress. Plan December spending.

tasks.title: Buy cat food and litter
tasks.description: Stock up on Mochi's favorite wet food and clumping litter. Maybe grab some new toys to keep her entertained.

tasks.title: Mock interview practice
tasks.description: Practice behavioral questions and live coding with friend. Focus on explaining thought process clearly.

tasks.title: Learn Three.js basics
tasks.description: Follow tutorial series on 3D web graphics. Build simple rotating cube demo and deploy to portfolio site.

tasks.title: Language exchange video call
tasks.description: 30-minute conversation with Yuki-san from HelloTalk. Practice discussing hobbies and weekend plans in Japanese.

tasks.title: Digital painting study - lighting
tasks.description: Follow Marco Bucci's lighting tutorial. Practice painting simple objects with dramatic lighting setups.

tasks.title: Research trip to Japan
tasks.description: Look into flight prices, accommodation options in Tokyo/Kyoto, and create rough 2-week itinerary for spring 2025.

tasks.title: Grocery shopping
tasks.description: Buy ingredients for meal prep: chicken, rice, vegetables, eggs, oat milk. Don't forget Mochi's favorite treats.

tasks.title: Debug portfolio website deployment
tasks.description: Fix CSS loading issues on mobile devices and optimize image loading. Test across different browsers.

tasks.title: Watch Japanese drama episode
tasks.description: Continue watching 'First Love' on Netflix with Japanese subtitles. Take notes on new vocabulary and expressions.

tasks.title: Procreate digital art practice
tasks.description: Follow along with character design tutorial, focusing on facial expressions and emotion portrayal.

subtasks.description: Initialize React app, set up Express backend, configure database connection

subtasks.title: Implement authentication system
subtasks.description: JWT tokens, login/register components, protected routes

subtasks.title: Build task CRUD operations
subtasks.description: Create, read, update, delete tasks with categories and tags

subtasks.title: Add drag-and-drop functionality
subtasks.description: Implement react-beautiful-dnd for task reordering and status changes

subtasks.title: Research target companies
subtasks.description: Identify companies with good culture fit, tech stack alignment

subtasks.title: Customize resume for each role
subtasks.description: Tailor resume bullets to match job requirements and keywords

subtasks.title: Write personalized cover letters
subtasks.description: Research company values, mention specific projects and interests

subtasks.title: Compare flight options
subtasks.description: Check prices across different airlines and dates, consider layovers

subtasks.title: Research accommodation
subtasks.description: Compare hotels, ryokans, and Airbnb options in different neighborhoods

subtasks.title: Create rough itinerary
subtasks.description: List must-see places, estimate travel times, check seasonal events

subtasks.title: Complete basic shapes tutorial
subtasks.description: Learn to create cubes, spheres, and basic geometries

subtasks.title: Study lighting and materials
subtasks.description: Understand different light types and material properties

subtasks.title: Build interactive demo
subtasks.description: Create mouse-controlled 3D scene for portfolio showcase
